      • maskPasswordInPropertyMap

        public static String maskPasswordInPropertyMap(String propertyMap)
        Helper function to mask a string of property bags that may contain a property with a password.
        Parameters:
        propertyMap - Property map to mask by replacing any passwords with the text "SECRET"
        Returns:
        New string with the passwords masked, or null if the property map is null.

      • maskPasswordInPropertyMap

        public static Map<String,String> maskPasswordInPropertyMap(Map<String,String> propertyMap)
        Helper function to mask a string of properties that may contain a property with a password.
        Parameters:
        propertyMap - Property map to mask by replacing any passwords with the text "SECRET"
        Returns:
        a new map with the passwords masked, or null if the propertyMap is null.

      • replaceReferencesWithPasswords

                                                  Cluster cluster)
                                           throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Replace secret references with appropriate real passwords.
        Parameters:
        targetMap - map in which replacement will be performed
        cluster - current cluster
        Throws:
        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

        Replace real passwords with secret references
        Parameters:
        propertiesTypes - map with properties types

                                                                     Map<String,String> propertiesMap,
                                                                     String configType,
                                                                     Long configVersion)
        Replace real passwords with secret references
        Parameters:
        configAttributes - map with config attributes containing properties types as part of their content
        propertiesMap - map with properties in which replacement will be performed
        configType - configuration type
        configVersion - configuration version
